item.title: ETS2/ATS Mod Status (1.58)
item.description:
Since ATS 1.58 came out yesterday and ETS2 1.58 is apparently coming out tomorrow, figured I’d write this.

ETS2-QJTI release 26.01 has some issues with the 1.58 update. This is due to SCS changing some things around with the Scania R & S with this update. Older releases, however, should work fine. SCS already fixed the issue that version intended to fix, so that override will be removed with the next update anyway.

I will also need to verify if FH6 Headlight Guard Fix needs tweaking. UPDATE FEB 12, 2026: This mod is now obsolete with 1.58.

It appears that all other currently supported mods for Euro Truck Simulator 2 and American Truck Simulator work without issues with the 1.58 update.

You can see all mods here.

item.title: TruckyMods update
item.description:
Due to a Cloudflare outage, my mods hosted on TruckyMods will be unavailable for the time being.

Note to self: don’t put all your eggs in one basket.

item.title: ETS2 Mod Status (1.57 Open Beta)
item.description:
I’m not sure if any mods need updating at the moment – probably not. At the time I’m writing this, I’m currently downloading the open beta for ETS2 1.57.

Depending on how this update affects the Scania R and S Quick Job trucks, which were updated with this version, ETS2-QJTI may receive an update related to them. ETS2-QJTI never affected these trucks, so the current version should still work with 1.57.

You can see all mods here.

item.title: ETS2/ATS Mod Status (1.56)
item.description:
Long overdue, but it appears that all currently supported mods for Euro Truck Simulator 2 and American Truck Simulator work without issues with the 1.56 update.

An undocumented change with 1.56 was that FMOD was updated from version 2.02.25 to 2.03.09. A select few sound mods may be impacted by this change. I haven’t produced any, but others have, so check with them to see if they need updating.

You can see all mods here.
